Yes, but no. The game has the potential to be the best FPS game there is, Period. However, VALVE hates the game, and therefore does not give it the attention it deserves. There are so many known issues that never seems to go away. Shots not getting registered, nades getting stuck to the ground, 64 tick official servers, the list goes on and on. (about the 64 tick. Yes, I get that some people have potatoes for computers. But the majority of CSGO players have a computer that handles 128 tick, so why not give us the choice to queue up for either.)

MASSIVE list of issues aside, great game. Buy it unless you have and/or enjoy being cucked by cheaters.
